cluster_relations.canonical_rel_desc: The subject enables or supports the emergence, development, or strengthening of the object, without being the sole or strictly deterministic cause.

qualifiers.CausalHint: From conveying emotions and intentions to establishing rapport

cluster_relations.rel_desc: Body language supports building interpersonal connections.
cluster_relations.canonical_rel_desc: The subject enables or supports the emergence, development, or strengthening of the object, without being the sole or strictly deterministic cause.

qualifiers.CausalHint: to establishing rapport and building connections

args.canonical_rel_desc: The subject facilitates the formation or strengthening of the object, typically a social bond or interpersonal connection, without being the sole or strictly deterministic cause.
args.justification: Both relations describe body language helping to build or strengthen social bonds (rapport, connections), i.e., specifically facilitating the formation of interpersonal relationships rather than a generic facilitation. Normalizing to a more precise predicate name ('facilitates_formation_of') captures this consistent semantics while keeping the existing relation class and causal grouping.

Normalizing to a more precise predicate name ('facilitates_formation_of') captures this consistent semantics while keeping the existing relation class and causal grouping.
